title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram: A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS Clarity
G Color) and Oval-cut Emeralds. Accented with lustrous South Sea Pearls.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a floral-inspired design meticulously crafted with pav√©-set diamonds. The pendant features a larger oval-cut emerald framed by intricate diamond lacework. Delicate South Sea pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance. The necklace utilizes a woven gold mesh chain for comfortable wear and a modern aesthetic.
colors: Predominantly gold and white due to the diamonds
with vibrant green emerald accents and soft white pearl drops. A harmonious blend of traditional colors.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings
and upscale social gatherings. Its versatile design also makes it suitable for modern cocktail parties and formal events.
description: This Diamond Haaram is a statement piece that seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design principles with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds ensures exceptional sparkle and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lasting luster. A true heirloom piece, crafted with precision and designed to be cherished for generations.
